clip.quote: Greg Pekarski is going to be teaching you lead generation secrets from a $220 million annual producer.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the expertise of a top producer, offering valuable insights.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to know how a top producer generates $220M in sales? Here's a sneak peek!

script:

clip.quote: Social media video mastery: how to generate leads while you sleep.
clip.why_clipworthy: Captures the essence of leveraging video for passive lead generation.
clip.suggested_hook: Discover how to generate leads even while you're sleeping!

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Discover how to generate leads even while you're sleeping!",
    "SETUP": "Meet Greg Pekarski, a real estate expert who cracked the code on passive lead generation through social media videos.",
    "INSIGHT": "Greg shares his secret: 'Create engaging video content that speaks directly to your audience's needs. Use platforms like Instagram and TikTok to reach them 24/7.'",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Imagine waking up to new leads every morning. By mastering video marketing, you can make this a reality for your business.",
    "CTA": "Ready to transform your lead strategy? Start creating videos today and watch your business grow!"
  },
  "caption": "Generate leads while you sleep with video marketing! #RealEstateTips",
  "hashtags": ["#LeadGeneration", "#VideoMarketing", "#RealEstate", "#SocialMediaStrategy", "#GregPekarski"],
  "content_pillar": "top_producer_secrets"
}
```
